title: Beachfront Great Ocean Road Escape
description: Set off for Australia's most iconic coastal road and immerse yourself in the scenic seaside charm of Lorne. Spend two or three nights in a chic Heritage Room at Mantra Lorne, the area’s only beachfront property. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, AU$50 dining credit to share, two AU$20 Endota Day Spa vouchers to share, one hour of bicycle hire to explore the area, a late 12pm checkout and more.

Enjoy a central location and the comfort of a chic and cosy cottage as well as a welcome bottle of white or red wine and a leisurely late 12pm checkout for four people.

title: Beachfront Escape on the Great Ocean Road

Spend three days/two nights in a charming Heritage Room at Mantra Lorne, the areas only beachfront property. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, $50 worth of endota Spa credits, dining credit, one hour of bicycle hire to explore the area, a late checkout and more for only $299 for two adults, valued up to $632.
location_description: Mantra Lorne [196894] Beachfront Escape on the Great Ocean Road

title: Great Ocean Road Escape at Lorne's Only Beachfront Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Set off for Australia's most iconic coastal road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm at Mantra Lorne, Lorne's only beachfront hotel. Built around Erskine House, the oldest operating guesthouse in Victoria, this heritage resort still provides all the modern comforts you love and have come to expect. What's more, you’re in a prime position to explore the rugged cliffs, quiet beaches, cascading waterfalls and lush forests of the Great Ocean Road.

At Mantra Lorne, you’re just steps from Lorne's picturesque beach. When you’re not heading off on expeditions to the Great Ocean Road’s natural wonders, you can while away a whole afternoon on the sand or in the water - that’s if you can tear yourself away from the convenient facilities of Mantra Lorne. Try your hand at a round of croquet on the lawn, practice your swing on the tennis court, or relax with a paddle in the indoor heated mineral pool. At the end of the day, kick your feet up in the lounge by the open fire and perhaps be wined and dined in The Larder restaurant.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start the day off right with daily à la carte breakfast at The Larder restaurant
- Enjoy A$50 dining credit per room, per stay, to spend on dinner at The Larder
- Toast your escape with a two-for-one drink offer to be used at the resort’s bar
- Relax up until the very last moment thanks to guaranteed 12pm late checkout
- Stay connected with free Wi-Fi

**Extended Stay Bonus**: Stay five nights or more and you'll receive A$100 dinner credit per room, per stay.

**Resort Room Upgrade:** The Resort Room beckons with postcard-perfect views to the lush garden or the resort's manicured gardens through white French doors, space to move and a serene, romantic vibe. 

**Apartment Upgrade:** Find your home-away-from-home in a wonderfully comfortable, self-contained one-bedroom apartment featuring a fully equipped kitchen, spacious lounge area and a balcony or terrace.

title: Adults-Only Escape on the Great Ocean Road
description: Experience a romantic escape to the gorgeous Victorian coastline and immerse yourself in the scenic seaside charm of Lorne, set on Australia’s most iconic coastal road. This adults-only haven is a great stop-off on a Great Ocean Road trip or a perfect self-contained escape from the city. Enjoy a continental breakfast served to your room every morning, a bottle of wine on arrival and a late midday check-out.

title: Beachfront Great Ocean Road Escape
description: Set off for Australia's most iconic coastal road and immerse yourself in the scenic seaside charm of Lorne. Drive through winding roads, hear waves crashing and take in the majestic natural landscape of one of Australia's most beautiful holiday destinations. Treat yourself and your better half to a getaway at Mantra Lorne, the area’s only beachfront property. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, an AU$50 voucher for dinner at The Larder, one AU$20 Endota Day Spa voucher, one hour of bicycle hire to explore the area, a guaranteed 12pm late checkout and more.

title: Great Ocean Road Escape at Lorne's Only Beachfront Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Set off for Victoria's iconic Great Ocean Road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm at Mantra Lorne, the beloved coastal town's only beachfront hotel. Built around Erskine House, the oldest operating guesthouse in Victoria, this heritage resort still provides all the modern comforts you need for a relaxing stay.

What's more, you’re in prime position to explore the rugged cliffs, quiet beaches, cascading waterfalls and lush forests of the Great Ocean Road, or Lorne's collection of upscale boutiques, quirky galleries and easygoing eateries.

When you’re not heading off on expeditions to the Great Ocean Road’s natural wonders, you can while away a whole afternoon on the sand or in the water. Try your hand at a round of croquet on the lawn, practice your swing on the tennis court, or relax with a paddle in the indoor heated mineral pool.

At the end of the day, kick your feet up by the hotel lounge's cosy open fireplace or head to The Larder for rustic Italian plates showcasing seasonal produce straight from the surrounding Otways.

title: Beach-Chic Escape on the Great Ocean Road
description: Nestled in a prime position, between vibrant restaurants and boutiques, Cumberland Lorne Resort offers impressive views of Louttit Bay from beachfront apartments. Enjoy all that the Great Ocean Road has to offer in this premium location with a two or three-night beachfront escape complete with daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, complimentary underground parking and a leisurely 12pm checkout. Plus, there’s a great family upgrade option!

title: Great Ocean Road Adults-Only Escape
description:
Experience a romantic escape to the gorgeous Great Ocean Road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm with a stay at the luxe Chatby Lane Lorne. Set on Australia’s most iconic coastal road, this adults-only haven makes a great stop on a road trip or a perfect escape from the city.

Lorne is one of Victoria's true holiday gems, and the blissful Chatby Lane Lorne is the ideal base to explore this beautiful coastal region at your leisure. Cruise down the Great Ocean Road and see famous landmarks including the iconic Twelve Apostles, Port Campbell, Erskine Falls and Great Otway National Park. Explore the coast's serene towns, brimming with shops and cafes, and swim or surf at a myriad of beaches that dot this beautiful region. When you're ready to relax and unwind, retreat to the boutique suites and apartments on offer, unwind on your balcony or patio, cook up a storm in the fully equipped kitchens and kitchenettes, or take a leisurely five-minute stroll to the beach to soak up the ocean breeze.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy daily continental breakfast served in the comfort of your room or apartment
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival
- Make the most of your final day with leisurely late 12pm checkout guaranteed

title: Great Ocean Road Escape at Lorne's Only Beachfront Hotel with Mineral Pool & Spa
description:
Set off for Victoria's iconic Great Ocean Road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm at Mantra Lorne, the beloved coastal town's only beachfront hotel. Built around Erskine House, the oldest operating guesthouse in Victoria, this heritage resort still provides all the modern comforts you need for a relaxing stay. What's more, you’re in prime position to explore the rugged cliffs, quiet beaches, and lush forests of the Great Ocean Road, or Lorne's collection of boutiques, galleries and eateries.

Set in 12 acres of landscaped gardens including tennis courts and croquet lawns, this seaside resort has everything you need right on your doorstep. Take a dip in the heated mineral pool, unwind in the steam room or enjoy a hearty meal at The Larder.
